agents.name: LangChain
agents.best_for: General-purpose AI agents, ecosystem breadth, and complex workflows beyond MCP.
agents.superpower: Composability and massive ecosystem of integrations.
agents.description: One of the most established frameworks in the AI agent ecosystem. Known for its extensive toolkit of chains, tool integrations, and reasoning loops.

agents.name: LangGraph
agents.best_for: Complex, multi-step agents with conditional logic and stateful orchestration.
agents.superpower: State machines, branching, loops, and retries for absolute control.
agents.description: A framework built on top of LangChain for building stateful, multi-actor applications with LLMs.

agents.name: AutoGen
agents.best_for: Collaborative and autonomous multi-agent systems, Microsoft ecosystem.
agents.superpower: Agent conversations, human-in-the-loop, and research-backed multi-agent patterns.
agents.description: A framework that enables the development of LLM applications using multiple agents that can converse with each other to solve tasks.

agents.name: CrewAI
agents.best_for: Role-based multi-agent orchestration and task delegation.
agents.superpower: Intuitive 'AI Team' mental model with clear roles and goals.
agents.description: Framework for orchestrating role-playing, autonomous AI agents. By collaborative intelligence, agents work together to tackle complex tasks.

agents.name: LlamaIndex
agents.best_for: Data-aware AI applications, RAG, and combining structured and unstructured data.
agents.superpower: Knowledge-driven agents with superior data ingestion and retrieval tools.
agents.description: A data framework for LLM applications to ingest, structure, and access private or domain-specific data.

agents.name: PydanticAI
agents.best_for: Type safety, data validation, and production-grade reliability in Python apps.
agents.superpower: Leverages Pydantic for runtime type checking and structured output validation.
agents.description: A GenAI agent framework designed to bring the 'FastAPI feeling' to agent development with full type safety.

agents.name: Claude Agent SDK
agents.best_for: Production deployments with Claude models, security-conscious applications.
agents.superpower: First-class MCP support and 'zero-trust' tool allowlisting.
agents.description: Anthropic's official framework for building autonomous agents, optimized for Claude models.

agents.name: OpenAI Agents SDK
agents.best_for: Agent handoffs, delegation patterns, and responsive UIs with streaming.
agents.superpower: Minimalist, composable agent patterns and native OpenAI model optimization.
agents.description: OpenAI's official framework for building lightweight, composable agents focused on handoffs and delegation.

agents.name: Google Agent Development Kit (ADK)
agents.best_for: Gemini and Google ecosystem, multi-language teams, production deployments.
agents.superpower: Multi-language support (including Java) and built-in web UI/CLI/API.
agents.description: Google's framework for developing and deploying AI agents, designed to feel like traditional software development.

agents.name: Agno
agents.best_for: Speed, minimal boilerplate, and spawning large fleets of agents at scale.
agents.superpower: High runtime performance (~3Î¼s instantiation) and minimal code (~10 lines for MCP).
agents.description: A lightweight framework focused on developer velocity and performance for building production agents.

agents.name: DSPy
agents.best_for: Systematic prompt optimization and treating prompts as a programming problem.
agents.superpower: Automatic prompt compilation and optimization based on evaluation datasets.
agents.description: A framework for algorithmically optimizing LLM prompts and weights, especially useful for complex pipelines.

agents.name: Mastra
agents.best_for: TypeScript/JavaScript developers, modern web stack, and Vercel ecosystem.
agents.superpower: All-in-one TypeScript framework with agents, workflows, RAG, and built-in evals.
agents.description: Built on Vercel AI SDK, Mastra provides a native TypeScript experience for building AI features.

agents.name: Semantic Kernel
agents.best_for: Production-grade agents, Microsoft ecosystem, and enterprise integration.
agents.superpower: Clean plugin architecture and seamless combination of prompts, tools, and memory.
agents.description: An SDK that integrates LLMs with conventional programming languages to build sophisticated agents.

agents.name: Haystack
agents.best_for: Search-based applications, RAG, and modular LLM pipelines.
agents.superpower: Modular architecture and strong expertise in search and retrieval.
agents.description: An open-source framework for building customizable LLM applications and search systems.

agents.name: mcp-agent
agents.best_for: Lightweight MCP-optimized development following Anthropic's agent patterns.
agents.superpower: Direct implementation of augmented LLM, parallel, and router patterns.
agents.description: A simple, lightweight library by lastmileAI highly optimized for the Model Context Protocol.

agents.name: Upsonic
agents.best_for: Financial sector, security, and scaling multi-agent systems.
agents.superpower: Emphasis on security and deflection of common LLM exploits.
agents.description: An AI agent framework targeted toward the financial sector with a security-first approach.
